Entries: There's a woman who visit with Lewis. Seems nice. Yet, all Pierre can do it commenting about her accesories.#$b#Sometimes I just can't with him.
That lady's aura is quite cloudy, like it's waiting for the sun to shine through.
So I heard there's someone who toured the town with Lewis. Of course he didn't bother to take her to this far away land $2
